location.sjis: マーネイル宿場 ほほえみ亭前

male.sjis: まずほほえみ亭って宿屋に行こう
male.ascii: I should head to Smile Inn first.

female.sjis: 先にほほえみ亭って 宿屋に行きたいな
female.ascii: I should really check out this 'Smile Inn' first

portrait_l.name: player
portrait_l.ascii: Let's head back to the inn.

male.sjis: まずほほえみ亭って宿屋に行こう
male.ascii: I should head to Smile Inn first.

female.sjis: 先にほほえみ亭って 宿屋に行きたいな
female.ascii: I should really check out this 'Smile Inn' first

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: 私のお母様は、旅商人なの 今は２人で旅をして鍛冶師や職人に 顔を売っている段階なんだって
portrait_l.ascii: My mom is a traveling merchant. Right now, we're on a journey to make ourselves known amongst the best of Craftknights.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: 将来は大きなお店をもつ予定なの だから、旅費は私が頑張って稼ぐしか 無いってことなの
portrait_l.ascii: We're going to build a big store. That's why I need to do my best and raise all the money I can.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: ところであなたは、鍛冶師みたいだけど 強化の情報を聞いていかない？
portrait_l.ascii: By the way, you seem like one. Want to know about enhancements?

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: えっとね、強化で「加速ゼンマイ」を 使うと、必殺技の「二連撃」が武器に 付加されるの
portrait_l.ascii: Well, there's this special material. If you use it on your weapon, you'll get 'Double Attack'.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: あっ、でも武器タイプによって 必殺技が付加されない場合があるから 気を付けてね
portrait_l.ascii: Ah! But depending on the weapon type some abilities become unusable. So, watch out, okay?

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: でもって、今回はなんと 「加速ゼンマイ」を、３５０バームで 販売中なの～
portrait_l.ascii: But anyway, I have this special material on sale right now, at a paltry price of 350 boam.

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: ええぇ～これじゃ～ お金たりないの～ 商談不成立だよ～
portrait_l.ascii: Eeh? You don't have the money! Transaction failed~

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: え～聞くだけ聞いて買ってくれないの～ ケチ～
portrait_l.ascii: Eeh? You listened to everything but you still won't buy it? Stingyyyyy~!

portrait_l.name: peddler's_daughter
portrait_l.sjis: え～聞いてくれないの～ せっかくのお客さんだと思ったのに～
portrait_l.ascii: Eeh? You won't even listen?! Just when I thought I finally had a new client

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: あの人にも困ったもんだよ 薪割りを手伝って欲しいとか言いながら 素人には任せられないって
portrait_l.ascii: That person is such a pain. He said he wanted help to chop wood, but he wants someone experienced

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 誰だって、最初は素人なのに どうすれば、いいんだよ 薪割り入門書でもあるのかよ
portrait_l.ascii: Everyone's an amateur at first. If I don't get a chance, how am I going to get experience at all?
